description: This file is part of the jQuery library, specifically handling event management including event binding, unbinding, triggering, and normalization of event objects.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds event handlers to elements, supporting multiple event types and namespaces.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes event handlers from elements based on specified criteria.

methods.name: trigger
methods.description: Triggers an event on selected elements, optionally propagating through the DOM.

methods.name: dispatch
methods.description: Dispatches an event to the appropriate handlers, managing event propagation and special event handling.

methods.name: handlers
methods.description: Determines the list of handlers to execute for an event, including delegated and directly-bound handlers.

methods.name: simulate
methods.description: Simulates an event of a given type on an element, optionally bubbling.
